edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection
Class ActionSelectionImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.LidaModuleImpl
      edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection.ActionSelectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionSelection, Initializable, LidaModule, ModuleListener, ProceduralMemoryListener
public class ActionSelectionImpl
extends LidaModuleImpl
implements ActionSelection, ProceduralMemoryListener

Rudimentary action selection that selects all behaviors sent to it which are above the selectionThreshold. Only selects an action every 'selectionFrequency' number of cycles it is run

Author:
Ryan J McCall
